Package de.lases.persistence.repository

Class ReviewRepository

java.lang.Object
de.lases.persistence.repository.ReviewRepository
public class ReviewRepository extends Object
Offers get/add/change/remove operations on a review and the possibility to get lists of reviews.

  • Constructor Details

    • ReviewRepository

      public ReviewRepository()

  • Method Details

    • get

      public static Review get​(Review review, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Takes a review dto that is filled out with a valid reviewerId, paperId and submissionId and returns a fully filled review dto.
      Parameters:
      review - A review dto that must be filled with a valid reviewerId, paperId and submissionId
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      A fully filled review dto.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no review with the provided ids.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • add

      public static void add​(Review review, Transaction transaction) throws DataNotWrittenException, KeyExistsException
      Adds a review to the repository.
      Parameters:
      review - A fully filled review dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      KeyExistsException - If there is already a reviewer with the same ids.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the review is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • change

      public static void change​(Review review, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Changes the given review in the repository.
      Parameters:
      review - A fully filled review dto.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no review with the provided reviewerId, paperId and submissionId.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      InvalidFieldsException - If one of the fields of the review is null.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • remove

      public static void remove​(Review review, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException, DataNotWrittenException
      Takes a review dto that is filled with a valid reviewerId, paperId and submissionId and removes this review from the repository.
      Parameters:
      review - The review to remove. Must be filled with a valid reviewerId, paperId and submissionId.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - The specified review was not found in the repository.
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • getList

      public static List<Review> getList​(Submission submission, User user, Transaction transaction, ResultListParameters resultListParameters) throws DataNotCompleteException, NotFoundException
      Gets a list all reviews that belong to the specified submission that the specified user can see. (An editor can see everything, the submitter can view see all visible reviews, a reviewer his own reviews.)
      Parameters:
      submission - A submission dto filled with a valid id.
      user - A user dto filled with a valid id.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      resultListParameters - The ResultListParameters dto that results parameters from the pagination like filtering, sorting or number of elements.
      Returns:
      A list of fully filled review dtos for all reviews that belong to the specified submission and the specified user can see.
      Throws:
      DataNotCompleteException - If the list is truncated.
      NotFoundException - If there is no submission with the provided id or there is no user with the provided id.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
      InvalidQueryParamsException - If the resultListParameters contain an erroneous option.

    • getPDF

      public static FileDTO getPDF​(Paper review, Transaction transaction) throws NotFoundException
      Get the PDF file for the provided review.
      Parameters:
      review - A review dto filled with a valid reviewerId, paperId and submissionId.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Returns:
      A file containing the PDF for the specified review.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If there is no review with the provided ids.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.

    • setPDF

      public static void setPDF​(Review review, FileDTO pdf, Transaction transaction) throws DataNotWrittenException, NotFoundException
      Sets the PDF belonging to a specified review.
      Parameters:
      review - A review dto filled with a valid reviewerId, paperId and submissionId.
      pdf - A file dto filled with a pdf file.
      transaction - The transaction to use.
      Throws:
      DataNotWrittenException - If writing the data to the repository fails.
      NotFoundException - If there is no review with the provided ids.
      DatasourceQueryFailedException - If the datasource cannot be queried.
